results.content:
LOL -- have a look at your thumbnail or 'course image': JSP does NOT STAND FOR javascript but means JAVA SERVER PAGES !! Also easily recognizable with the coffee cup symbolising JAVA (not javascript). Anybody knowing the first thing of JS and .jsp etc should know that -- this simply MUSt NOt happen, or everybody will say. 'some expert you must be'...

Seriously, you need to get a better course image befor going public!
